text: fasfah -ayha alrswl- enhm, wa'aerid ean adhahm, wala yabdur mink 'iilaa alsalam lahum aladhi yaquluh 'uwlu al'albab walbsayr lljahlyn, fahum la ysafhwnhm wala yeamlwnhm bimithl 'aemalahum alsyyt, fasawf yaelamun ma ylqawnh min albala' walnkal. wafi hdha tahdid wweyd shadid lhwla' alkafirin almeandyn wamthalhm
